svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Political regime vs. Mean years of schooling, 1870 to 2010
Political regimes are classified on a range from -10 (full autocracy) to +10 (full democracy).
Average annual change in mean years of schooling
Average annual change in political regime (from -10 full autocracy to +10 full
Source: Political Regime (OWID based on Polity IV and Wimmer & Min), Lee and Lee (2016)
